executiveSummary: A brief overview of the business model's viability, key findings, and recommendations.

businessModelValidation.description: Detailed validation of the business model.

revenueStreams.streamName: Example Stream 1 (e.g., Product Sales, Subscription Fees)
revenueStreams.potentialValue: Estimated monetary value or projection metrics.

pricingModels.modelName: Example Pricing Model (e.g., Freemium, Tiered, Value-Based)

monetizationStrategies.strategyName: Example Monetization Strategy (e.g., Direct Sales, Partnerships, Advertising)
monetizationStrategies.description: How the project will generate income.

maintenanceCosts.category: Example Category (e.g., Software Updates, Server Costs, Support)

breakEvenAnalysis.description: Analysis of the point at which revenues equal costs.
breakEvenAnalysis.breakEvenPoint: Units or revenue needed to break even.
breakEvenAnalysis.methodology: How the break-even point was calculated.

roiCalculations.timeframeForROI: Expected timeframe to achieve this ROI.

marketAnalysisSummary.targetMarket: Brief description of the target market.
marketAnalysisSummary.marketSizeAndGrowth: Key metrics on market size and growth potential.
marketAnalysisSummary.competitiveLandscape: Summary of key competitors and differentiation.

viabilityAssessment.recommendations: Specific recommendations based on the analysis.

appendices.title: Appendix A: Detailed Financial Data
appendices.contentReference: Link to or description of detailed financial spreadsheets or data sources.
